title: Goodwin Allen Ginter N43 World Champions 1888
author: coco

posts.post_title: Goodwin Allen Ginter N43 World Champions 1888
posts.post_content: I have a friend searching for an 1888, N43 Allen & Ginter Worlds Champions card of Fred Wood.  He is a high wheel bicycle racer.  I am trying to find this for him.
